column1: Timeline of Jiang Wei's Northern Expeditions#Timeline of Jiang Wei's Northern Expeditions#Timeline of Jiang Wei's Northern Expeditions

column2: Gansu#First Northern Expedition: Jiang Wei attacks Longxi Commandery but is driven back by Guo Huai.Guo Huai also defeats the Qiang tribes under Midang and forces them to surrender.

column1: 247#Gansu and Qinghai#Second Northern Expedition: The Qiang tribes rebel against Wei rule in Longxi
column3: Jincheng and Xiping commanderies.Jiang Wei leads Shu forces to support the Qiang rebels.Guo Huai and Xiahou Ba drive back Jiang Wei and suppress the Qiang rebellions.

column2: Qinghai and Inner Mongolia#Guo Huai defeats Qiang rebels under Ezhesai and Zhiwudai in Heguan
column3: Baitu and Longyi counties.Third Northern Expedition: Jiang Wei leads Shu forces to support Zhiwudai
column4: and leaves Liao Hua behind to guard Chengzhong Mountain.

column1: 6 Feb – 1 Mar 249##Xiahou Ba defects to Shu after the Incident at Gaoping Tombs on 5 Feb.

column2: Shaanxi and Sichuan#Fourth Northern Expedition: Jiang Wei attacks Yong Province and builds two fortresses at Qushan.Chen Tai
column3: Xu Zhi and Deng Ai capture the two Shu fortresses at Qushan.Jiang Wei pretends to retreat and sends Liao Hua to attack Deng Ai at Baishui and keep him distracted.

column1: 250#Qinghai#Fifth Northern Expedition: Jiang Wei attacks Xiping Commandery and retreats after failing to capture it.

column2: Sichuan#Fei Yi is assassinated by Guo Xiu
Anhui#Battle of Hefei: Zhang Te successfully defends Hefei from attacks by Zhuge Ke.

column1: 14 Jun – 9 Sep 253#Southeastern Gansu#Sixth Northern Expedition: Jiang Wei besieges Didao.Sima Shi orders Guo Huai and Chen Tai to repel Jiang Wei.Jiang Wei pulls back his troops when they run out of food supplies.

2 – 31 Jul 254#Southeastern Gansu#Seventh Northern Expedition: Jiang Wei attacks Longxi Commandery.Li Jian defects and surrenders Didao to Shu.Battle of Xiangwu County: Zhang Ni and Xu Zhi are killed in battle.Shu forces capture Didao
column2: Heguan and Lintao and relocate their residents to Shu territory.

column1: 18 Sep – 11 Nov 255#Southeastern Gansu#Eighth Northern Expedition: Battle of Didao
8 Aug – 6 Sep#Southeastern Gansu#Ninth Northern Expedition: Deng Ai repels an invasion led by Jiang Wei.

c. Jun 257 – Mar/Apr 258#Gansu and Shaanxi#Zhuge Dan's Rebellion: Zhuge Dan starts a rebellion against Wei in Shouchun with support from Eastern Wu but the rebellion is ultimately suppressed by Wei forces.

c. Jun 257 – Mar/Apr 258#shou county anhui#Tenth Northern Expedition: Jiang Wei attacks the Wei garrisons near the Great Wall. Sima Wang and Deng Ai surround Jiang Wei at Mangshui but do not engage him in battle.
30 Oct – 28 Nov 262#Southeastern Gansu#Eleventh Northern Expedition: Deng Ai defeats Jiang Wei at Houhe County. Jiang Wei retreats to Tazhong.
